usa: The Casablanca Conference was held.[193]
The Broadway musical Oklahoma! opened.[194]

The Detroit Race Riot occurred; resulting in the deaths of 34 Whites and African-Americans and leaving 670 injured.<sup id="cite_ref-195" class="reference">[195]</sup><sup id="cite_ref-196" class="reference">[196]</sup>
Armistice of Cassibile: General Dwight Eisenhower publicly announces the surrender of Italy to the Allied Powers; with Italy later declaring war on Germany one month later.[197][198][199]
The Cairo Conference was held.[200]
The Tehran Conference was held between the "Big Three" Allied leaders of World War II.[201]
